title: 组合总和 III (Combination Sum III)
content: 思路: // @Title: 组合总和 III (Combination Sum III) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-19 21:32:13 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public List<List<Integer>> combinationSum3(int k, int n) { List<List<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>(); dfs(result, new ArrayList<>(), 1, 0, k, n); return result; } private void dfs(List<List<Integer>> result, List<Integer> list, int cur, int sum, int k, int n) { if (list.size() == k && sum == n) { result.add(new ArrayList<>(list)); return; } if (list.size() > k || sum > n || cur > 9) { return; } list.add(cur); dfs(result, list, cur + 1, sum + cur, k, n); list.remove(list.size() - 1); dfs(result, list, cur + 1, sum, k, n); } }
